message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CR 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language) because it deals with text analysis and classification. Specifically, it focuses on identifying deceptive opinion spam, which is a type of text-based deception. Other likely sub-categories include cs.IR (Information Retrieval) because the paper deals with identifying and filtering out spam from online content, cs.LG (Machine Learning) because the paper proposes a new method for improving the accuracy of text classification using convolutional neural networks, cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) because the paper deals with developing algorithms for identifying and filtering out deceptive content, and cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) because the paper deals with identifying and mitigating the harm caused by deceptive content on the internet.
